post_text: March 23, 2020 at 12:21â€¯PM#1trying to create an effect, using a macroI found some interesting info here to manipulate effect settingshttps://support.actlighting.com/knowledgeBase/11662803but did not find any information in how to add a line using macros, in the effect editor.also, a second question.. is it possible to select a predefined effect using a macro? title: Effect Editor - add line
